document.title: Research data services in European libraries: Current offerings and plans for the future.
document.publication-title: DataONE Sociocultural and Usability & Assessment Working Groups

field.name: comments
field.value: Presentation at the 2nd RDM Forum for the Portuguese Secretary of State for Science and Higher Education, Lisbon, Portugal, at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid in Madrid, Spain (3-2-2017), and at Universidade do Minho, Portugal, in Guimaraes, Portugal (3-31-2017).
